attributes.name: LaunchDaemon Creation or Modification and Immediate Loading v100.0.0
attributes.description: Indicates the creation or modification of a launch daemon, which adversaries may use to repeatedly execute malicious payloads as part of persistence.
author: Elastic
attributes.query:
sequence by host.id with maxspan=1m
 [file where event.type != "deletion" and file.path : ("/System/Library/LaunchDaemons/*", "/Library/LaunchDaemons/*")]
 [process where event.type in ("start", "process_started") and process.name == "launchctl" and process.args == "load"]
